verses.text_plain: Now in the twelfth month, that is, the month Adar, on the thirteenth day of the same, when the king’s commandment and his decree drew near to be put in execution, in the day that the enemies of the Jews hoped to have power over them, (though it was turned to the contrary, that the Jews had rule over them that hated them;)
verses.verse_html: 1Now in the twelfth month, that is, the month Adar, on the thirteenth day of the same, when the king’s commandment and his decree drew near to be put in execution, in the day that the enemies of the Jews hoped to have power over them, (though it was turned to the contrary, that the Jews had rule over them that hated them;)

tokens.text: of the same, when the king’s
to the contrary, that the Jews

verses.text_plain: The Jews gathered themselves together in their cities throughout all the provinces of the king Ahasuerus, to lay hand on such as sought their hurt: and no man could withstand them; for the fear of them fell upon all people.
verses.verse_html: 2The Jews gathered themselves together in their cities throughout all the provinces of the king Ahasuerus, to lay hand on such as sought their hurt: and no man could withstand them; for the fear of them fell upon all people.

verses.text_plain: And all the rulers of the provinces, and the lieutenants, and the deputies, and officers of the king, helped the Jews; because the fear of Mordecai fell upon them.
verses.verse_html:
3And all the rulers of the provinces, and the lieutenants, and the deputies, and officers of the king, helped the Jews; because the fear of Mordecai fell upon them. ▼
▼ officers…: Heb. those which did the business that belonged to the king

footnotes.body_text: ▼ officers…: Heb. those which did the business that belonged to the king
footnotes.body_html: ▼ officers…: Heb. those which did the business that belonged to the king

verses.text_plain: For Mordecai was great in the king’s house, and his fame went out throughout all the provinces: for this man Mordecai waxed greater and greater.
verses.verse_html: 4For Mordecai was great in the king’s house, and his fame went out throughout all the provinces: for this man Mordecai waxed greater and greater.

verses.text_plain: Thus the Jews smote all their enemies with the stroke of the sword, and slaughter, and destruction, and did what they would unto those that hated them.
verses.verse_html:
5Thus the Jews smote all their enemies with the stroke of the sword, and slaughter, and destruction, and did what they would unto those that hated them. ▼
▼ what…: Heb. according to their will

footnotes.body_text: ▼ what…: Heb. according to their will
footnotes.body_html: ▼ what…: Heb. according to their will

verses.text_plain: And in Shushan the palace the Jews slew and destroyed five hundred men.
verses.verse_html: 6And in Shushan the palace the Jews slew and destroyed five hundred men.

verses.text_plain: And Parshandatha, and Dalphon, and Aspatha,
verses.verse_html: 7And Parshandatha, and Dalphon, and Aspatha,

verses.text_plain: And Poratha, and Adalia, and Aridatha,
verses.verse_html: 8And Poratha, and Adalia, and Aridatha,

verses.text_plain: And Parmashta, and Arisai, and Aridai, and Vajezatha,
verses.verse_html: 9And Parmashta, and Arisai, and Aridai, and Vajezatha,

verses.text_plain: The ten sons of Haman the son of Hammedatha, the enemy of the Jews, slew they; but on the spoil laid they not their hand.
verses.verse_html: 10The ten sons of Haman the son of Hammedatha, the enemy of the Jews, slew they; but on the spoil laid they not their hand.

verses.text_plain: On that day the number of those that were slain in Shushan the palace was brought before the king.
verses.verse_html:
11On that day the number of those that were slain in Shushan the palace was brought before the king. ▼
▼ was…: Heb. came

verses.text_plain: And the king said unto Esther the queen, The Jews have slain and destroyed five hundred men in Shushan the palace, and the ten sons of Haman; what have they done in the rest of the king’s provinces? now what is thy petition? and it shall be granted thee: or what is thy request further? and it shall be done.
verses.verse_html: 12And the king said unto Esther the queen, The Jews have slain and destroyed five hundred men in Shushan the palace, and the ten sons of Haman; what have they done in the rest of the king’s provinces? now what is thy petition? and it shall be granted thee: or what is thy request further? and it shall be done.

verses.text_plain: Then said Esther, If it please the king, let it be granted to the Jews which are in Shushan to do to morrow also according unto this day’s decree, and let Haman’s ten sons be hanged upon the gallows.
verses.verse_html:
13Then said Esther, If it please the king, let it be granted to the Jews which are in Shushan to do to morrow also according unto this day’s decree, and let Haman’s ten sons be hanged upon the gallows. ▼
▼ let Haman’s…: Heb. let men hang, etc

footnotes.body_text: ▼ let Haman’s…: Heb. let men hang, etc
footnotes.body_html: ▼ let Haman’s…: Heb. let men hang, etc

verses.text_plain: And the king commanded it so to be done: and the decree was given at Shushan; and they hanged Haman’s ten sons.
verses.verse_html: 14And the king commanded it so to be done: and the decree was given at Shushan; and they hanged Haman’s ten sons.

verses.text_plain: For the Jews that were in Shushan gathered themselves together on the fourteenth day also of the month Adar, and slew three hundred men at Shushan; but on the prey they laid not their hand.
verses.verse_html: 15For the Jews that were in Shushan gathered themselves together on the fourteenth day also of the month Adar, and slew three hundred men at Shushan; but on the prey they laid not their hand.

verses.text_plain: But the other Jews that were in the king’s provinces gathered themselves together, and stood for their lives, and had rest from their enemies, and slew of their foes seventy and five thousand, but they laid not their hands on the prey,
verses.verse_html: 16But the other Jews that were in the king’s provinces gathered themselves together, and stood for their lives, and had rest from their enemies, and slew of their foes seventy and five thousand, but they laid not their hands on the prey,

verses.text_plain: On the thirteenth day of the month Adar; and on the fourteenth day of the same rested they, and made it a day of feasting and gladness.
verses.verse_html:
17On the thirteenth day of the month Adar; and on the fourteenth day of the same rested they, and made it a day of feasting and gladness. ▼
▼ of the same: Heb. in it

footnotes.body_text: ▼ of the same: Heb. in it
footnotes.body_html: ▼ of the same: Heb. in it

verses.text_plain: But the Jews that were at Shushan assembled together on the thirteenth day thereof, and on the fourteenth thereof; and on the fifteenth day of the same they rested, and made it a day of feasting and gladness.
verses.verse_html: 18But the Jews that were at Shushan assembled together on the thirteenth day thereof, and on the fourteenth thereof; and on the fifteenth day of the same they rested, and made it a day of feasting and gladness.

verses.text_plain: Therefore the Jews of the villages, that dwelt in the unwalled towns, made the fourteenth day of the month Adar a day of gladness and feasting, and a good day, and of sending portions one to another.
verses.verse_html: 19Therefore the Jews of the villages, that dwelt in the unwalled towns, made the fourteenth day of the month Adar a day of gladness and feasting, and a good day, and of sending portions one to another.

verses.text_plain: And Mordecai wrote these things, and sent letters unto all the Jews that were in all the provinces of the king Ahasuerus, both nigh and far,
verses.verse_html: 20And Mordecai wrote these things, and sent letters unto all the Jews that were in all the provinces of the king Ahasuerus, both nigh and far,

verses.text_plain: To stablish this among them, that they should keep the fourteenth day of the month Adar, and the fifteenth day of the same, yearly,
verses.verse_html: 21To stablish this among them, that they should keep the fourteenth day of the month Adar, and the fifteenth day of the same, yearly,

tokens.text: among them, that they should keep

verses.text_plain: As the days wherein the Jews rested from their enemies, and the month which was turned unto them from sorrow to joy, and from mourning into a good day: that they should make them days of feasting and joy, and of sending portions one to another, and gifts to the poor.
verses.verse_html: 22As the days wherein the Jews rested from their enemies, and the month which was turned unto them from sorrow to joy, and from mourning into a good day: that they should make them days of feasting and joy, and of sending portions one to another, and gifts to the poor.

verses.text_plain: And the Jews undertook to do as they had begun, and as Mordecai had written unto them;
verses.verse_html: 23And the Jews undertook to do as they had begun, and as Mordecai had written unto them;

verses.text_plain: Because Haman the son of Hammedatha, the Agagite, the enemy of all the Jews, had devised against the Jews to destroy them, and had cast Pur, that is, the lot, to consume them, and to destroy them;
verses.verse_html:
24Because Haman the son of Hammedatha, the Agagite, the enemy of all the Jews, had devised against the Jews to destroy them, and had cast Pur, that is, the lot, to consume them, and to destroy them; ▼
▼ consume: Heb. crush

verses.text_plain: But when Esther came before the king, he commanded by letters that his wicked device, which he devised against the Jews, should return upon his own head, and that he and his sons should be hanged on the gallows.
verses.verse_html:
25But when Esther came before the king, he commanded by letters that his wicked device, which he devised against the Jews, should return upon his own head, and that he and his sons should be hanged on the gallows. ▼
▼ when…: Heb. when she came

tokens.text: and that he and his sons

footnotes.body_html: ▼ when…: Heb. when she came

verses.text_plain: Wherefore they called these days Purim after the name of Pur. Therefore for all the words of this letter, and of that which they had seen concerning this matter, and which had come unto them,
verses.verse_html:
26Wherefore they called these days Purim after the name of Pur. Therefore for all the words of this letter, and of that which they had seen concerning this matter, and which had come unto them, ▼
▼ Pur: that is, Lot

footnotes.body_html: ▼ Pur: that is, Lot

verses.text_plain: The Jews ordained, and took upon them, and upon their seed, and upon all such as joined themselves unto them, so as it should not fail, that they would keep these two days according to their writing, and according to their appointed time every year;
verses.verse_html:
27The Jews ordained, and took upon them, and upon their seed, and upon all such as joined themselves unto them, so as it should not fail, that they would keep these two days according to their writing, and according to their appointed time every year; ▼
▼ fail: Heb. pass

tokens.text: upon them, and upon their seed
and upon all such as joined
themselves unto them, so as it should not fail

verses.text_plain: And that these days should be remembered and kept throughout every generation, every family, every province, and every city; and that these days of Purim should not fail from among the Jews, nor the memorial of them perish from their seed.
verses.verse_html:
28And that these days should be remembered and kept throughout every generation, every family, every province, and every city; and that these days of Purim should not fail from among the Jews, nor the memorial of them perish from their seed. ▼
▼ fail: Heb. pass
 , ▼
▼ perish: Heb. be ended

footnotes.body_html: ▼ perish: Heb. be ended

verses.text_plain: Then Esther the queen, the daughter of Abihail, and Mordecai the Jew, wrote with all authority, to confirm this second letter of Purim.
verses.verse_html:
29Then Esther the queen, the daughter of Abihail, and Mordecai the Jew, wrote with all authority, to confirm this second letter of Purim. ▼
▼ authority: Heb. strength

verses.text_plain: And he sent the letters unto all the Jews, to the hundred twenty and seven provinces of the kingdom of Ahasuerus, with words of peace and truth,
verses.verse_html: 30And he sent the letters unto all the Jews, to the hundred twenty and seven provinces of the kingdom of Ahasuerus, with words of peace and truth,

verses.text_plain: To confirm these days of Purim in their times appointed, according as Mordecai the Jew and Esther the queen had enjoined them, and as they had decreed for themselves and for their seed, the matters of the fastings and their cry.
verses.verse_html:
31To confirm these days of Purim in their times appointed, according as Mordecai the Jew and Esther the queen had enjoined them, and as they had decreed for themselves and for their seed, the matters of the fastings and their cry. ▼
▼ themselves: Heb. their souls

tokens.text: them, and as they had decreed

footnotes.body_html: ▼ themselves: Heb. their souls

verses.text_plain: And the decree of Esther confirmed these matters of Purim; and it was written in the book.
verses.verse_html: 32And the decree of Esther confirmed these matters of Purim; and it was written in the book.
